steps.name: Given I have deployed the Operator with cluster scope access
Given I have created a ProvidedCapability 'my-capability1' with the label 'my-label=value1' in the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr64-test99'
And I have created a ProvidedCapability 'my-capability2' with the label 'my-label=value2' in the Namespace 'entando-k8s-operator-common-cmpr64-test992'
Expect ProvidedCapability 'my-capability1' to be resolved using the label 'my-label=value1'

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a support developer, I would like perform common operations on the ProvidedCapability resources through a simple interface to reduce the learning curve
